how_to_get_dropbox_urls: 2. Right-click the video file and select 'Share'
3. Click 'Create link' to get a sharing URL
4. Modify the URL to end with '&dl=1' instead of '&dl=0' to force direct download
5. Use this modified URL in the videoUrl field above
_instructions.for_local_development: If videoUrl is not provided, the app will fallback to ./videos/filename for local development
_instructions.github_pages_deployment: Make sure your GitHub Pages is enabled and using GitHub Actions for deployment
